Protocols/PagedMediaDelegate.html#/s:16P.name: pagedMediaViewController(_:willTransitionTo:)
Protocols/PagedMediaDelegate.html#/s:16P.abstract: Called just before the transition to a new item begins. Useful for centering table/collection view items behind the scenes for proper transition animation.

Protocols/PagedMediaDelegate.html#/s:16P.name: pagedMediaViewController(_:didTransitionTo:fromIndex:)
Protocols/PagedMediaDelegate.html#/s:16P.abstract: Called after the transition to a new item is completed.

Protocols/PagedMediaDelegate.html#/s:16P.name: pagedMediaViewController(_:willDismissToOriginalViewAt:fromPagedMediaItem:)
Protocols/PagedMediaDelegate.html#/s:16P.abstract: Called just before the transition ends. Perfect time to unpause the original view at index.

Protocols/PagedMediaDataSource.html#/s:1.name: presentationViewInsets(for:)
Protocols/PagedMediaDataSource.html#/s:1.abstract: Adds insets on PagedMediaViewController‘s view presentation frame. Defaults to .zero. Useful for preventing presentation over promotional content.

Protocols/PagedMediaDataSource.html#/s:1.name: pagedMediaViewController(_:pagedMediaViewForItemAt:)
Protocols/PagedMediaDataSource.html#/s:1.abstract: Provides the media item view for the given index.

Protocols/PagedMediaDataSource.html#/s:1.name: pagedMediaViewController(_:originalViewForItemAt:)
Protocols/PagedMediaDataSource.html#/s:1.abstract: Provides the original view for the given index. Used for transition animations.

Protocols/PagedMediaDataSource.html#/s:1.name: pagedMediaViewController(_:transitionImageForItemAt:)
Protocols/PagedMediaDataSource.html#/s:1.abstract: Optional method for specifying the original image for the view or a snapshot. By default PagedMediaTransitionDriver will create a snapshot from the original view.

Protocols/PagedMediaItem.html#/s:16Paged.name: paused
Protocols/PagedMediaItem.html#/s:16Paged.abstract: Updates paused state depending on the transition status.

Protocols/PagedMediaItem.html#/s:16Paged.name: isAnimated
Protocols/PagedMediaItem.html#/s:16Paged.abstract: Whether the item is animated (video, gif, etc) or static (image, etc).

Protocols/PagedMediaItem.html#/s:16Paged.name: animatedItemSnapshotAtCurrentTime
Protocols/PagedMediaItem.html#/s:16Paged.abstract: Used in the last part of the dismissal transition for animated items (if not nil) for smooth effect. Defaults to nil.

Protocols/PagedMediaItem.html#/s:16Paged.name: animatedItemControlsView
Protocols/PagedMediaItem.html#/s:16Paged.abstract: Controls for play/pause and scrubbing. Defaults to nil.

Protocols/PagedMediaItem.html.name: PagedMediaItem
Protocols/PagedMediaItem.html.abstract: Media item to be presented in the PagedMediaViewController.

Protocols/PagedMediaDataSource.html.name: PagedMediaDataSource
Protocols/PagedMediaDataSource.html.abstract: Data source for providing media items and original views for transition animations.

Protocols/PagedMediaDelegate.html.name: PagedMediaDelegate
Protocols/PagedMediaDelegate.html.abstract: Delegate for transition and item change events.

Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/s.name: initialIndex
Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/s.abstract: Index of the item to be presented first.

Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/s.name: headerViewContainer
Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/s.abstract: Header view container. Add your custom header views here.

Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/s.name: footerViewContainer
Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/s.abstract: Footer view container. Add your custom footer views here.

Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/s.name: pagedMediaDataSource
Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/s.abstract: Data source for providing the media items and original views.

Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/s.name: pagedMediaDelegate
Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/s.abstract: Delegate for transition and item change events.

Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/c.name: prefersStatusBarHidden
Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/c.abstract: Hidden status bar when header/footer are hidden.

Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/s.name: init(initialIndex:)
Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html#/s.abstract: Initializes the paged media view controller with the given initial index of the media item.

Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html.name: PagedMediaViewController
Classes/PagedMediaViewController.html.abstract: The main view controller for presenting and paging through media items.
